fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Open a library during the day. 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you open the Library, up to three authorized players may enter. First come, first serve.
- "Evil" roles may announce a claim to the host in their private channel upon entering the library.
- At the end of the day, you will gain a list of three roles for each player who enters. The list will contain the player's actual role, and must have at least one Sentry role (the "Claim" of Evils if they announced one), and one non-Sentry role. All roles listed must be able to spawn in the current game.
